alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 4:59PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MENDOCINO AND SOUTHERN LAKE COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM PST... At 458 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Cloverdale, or 13 miles south of Lakeport, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ukiah, Lakeport, Middletown, Clearlake, Forest Lake, Boonville, Mount Konocti, Hobergs, Ettawa Springs, Hopland, Whispering Pines, Seigler Springs, Adams, Loch Lomond, Knobcone Camp, Anderson Springs, Glenhaven, Soda Bay, North Lakeport, and Konocti Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
